name: trello
description: Trello integration plugin for Claude Code - zero dependencies, direct API calls. Create, view, search, and manage Trello cards and boards with no MCP or external libraries required.

setup.instructions:
To use this plugin, you need to configure your Trello credentials:

1. Get your Trello API key from https://trello.com/app-key
2. Generate a token by clicking the 'Token' link on that page
3. Get your board ID from the board URL (the part after /b/)
4. Add the following to your .claude/settings.json:

{
  "env": {
    "TRELLO_API_KEY": "your-api-key",
    "TRELLO_TOKEN": "your-token",
    "TRELLO_BOARD_ID": "your-board-id"
  }
}

5. Restart Claude Code

Available commands:
- /trello-create - Create a new card
- /trello-get - View card details
- /trello-update - Update a card
- /trello-move - Move card to different list
- /trello-archive - Archive a card
- /trello-comment - Add a comment
- /trello-lists - View board lists
- /trello-search - Search cards
- /trello-my-cards - View your assigned cards
- /trello-checklist - Manage checklists
- /trello-activity - View recent activity
